gloskampen.control

Class CoGlossary

  • java.lang.Object
    • gloskampen.control.CoGlossary

  • public class CoGlossary
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for handling the control part of a glossary quiz.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoGlossary(int totNumWordsInTest)
      Constructor that makes a new quiz

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoGlossary

        public CoGlossary(int totNumWordsInTest)
        Constructor that makes a new quiz
        Parameters:
        totNumWordsInTest - Total number of words in a test

    • Method Detail

      • getNewGlossary

        public java.lang.String getNewGlossary()
        Asks for a new word from the glossary model object. If already reached totNumberOfglossaries one of the failed is returned instead
        Returns:
        The word to be translated

      • validateGlossary

        public java.lang.String validateGlossary(java.lang.String triedGlossary)
        Validates a glossary that the user has entered.
        Parameters:
        triedGlossary - The glossary to check
        Returns:
        Empty string if glossary was correct else the correct glossary

      • getPercentDone

        public int getPercentDone()
        Get percent of test that is done. This does not include extra tests to be done which was failed first
        Returns:
        Percent of tests that has been done

      • getNumberOfFailedGlossaries

        public int getNumberOfFailedGlossaries()
        Gets number of failed test cases to be shown for user
        Returns:
        Number of failed test cases

      • getTotNumberOfGlossaries

        public int getTotNumberOfGlossaries()
        Gets total number of glossaries in test. To be shown for user
        Returns:
        Total number of glossaries in test (not included extra glossaries due to failed ones.

      • setLanguagesAndLevelTrials

        public void setLanguagesAndLevelTrials(int fromLanguage,
                              int toLanguage,
                              int level,
                              int numberOfTrials)
        Sets to- and from language and level for quiz.
        Parameters:
        fromLanguage - language to translate from
        toLanguage - language to translate to
        level - level for test
        numberOfTrials - number of trials for a glossary

      • validateUserName

        public java.lang.Boolean validateUserName()
        Validates the user name for correct syntax
        Returns:
        true if syntax is correct. Otherwise false
